resources.string: Thank you for downloading Campus Watch! Please follow along with this tutorial to ensure you get full use of the apps features before an emergency situation
In the event of an emergency, or you need assistance, tap and hold it briefly to alert dispatch. They track your location and send help immediately.
Each dot is a report submitted by other users. You can tap on them for more details or press and hold anywhere on the map to submit one yourself.

When you open the app please take a minute to update your profile by pulling out the drawer from the left side. Choose a clear photo of yourself and don\'t forget the phone number! These things help us get in touch with you if you are in trouble, and we never share your information

Once you have activated the Help Button you will be connected to Dispatch. Feel free to give them more information about your situation, or snap a picture with the Camera button. Regardless, help is on the way.
You are all set! If you ever need a refresher on how to use all the features just head over to www.campuswatch.com
